items.title: This Changes Everything: One Of The Most Important Shifts For Dividend Investors
items.description: Inflation isn't just back, it's becoming policy. Read why I'm sharpening my focus on pricing power, hard assets, and income that's built for this new reality.

items.title: 3 Reasons to Sell CAT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
items.description: Caterpillar has followed the marketâ€™s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 5.7% to $383.80 per share while the index has gained 4.5%.

items.title: Dollar's Biggest Crash In Decades: These 7 Stocks Could Win Big
items.author: Piero Cingari
items.description: The U.S. Dollar Index has plunged 10.5% year-to-date, marking its worst first-half performance since 1991. This decline benefits U.S. multinationals with strong international sales, as a weaker dollar increases their global competitiveness and boosts foreign revenue value.
